articles.title: How a group of Dallas-based high school kids turned into Utah State's marching band for a day - KSL.com
articles.description: While the on-field Aggies appeared to no-show in a 38-10 loss to Memphis in the First Responders Bowl, the Longhorn Red Army Marching Band of Cedar Hill High School certainly did not.
articles.content:
Estimated read time: 4-5 minutes
DALLAS An hour prior to kickoff of the First Responders Bowl, dozens upon dozens of high school students sprawled out in the shadows of Gerald J. Ford Stadium and go… [+4670 chars]
